item.description:
I just checked the movie listings and the show time for "Stranger than Fiction" is 8PM.

Lets try to meet in front of the escalators at 7:30. Remember that this is opening weekend so you might want to buy your ticket ahead of time.

From the trailers I have seen on this film it looks like it will be pretty funny.

Cast: Will Ferrell, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Dustin Hoffman, Queen Latifah, Emma Thompson, Kristin Chenoweth, Tony Hale, Tom Hulce, Linda Hunt, Eli Goodman, Ora Jones, Denise Hughes, Michael Cook, Guy Massey, Ray Kurut

For more details about the film go to:


http://www.darkhorizo...

As usual, we will probably go out for food & drinks after the show. Let me know if you have any suggestions for libations!
item.name: Stranger than Fiction
